idea-plugin.name: Base16 Eva
idea-plugin.vendor: kjakapat (https://github.com/kjakapat), Shirom Makkad, and the Base16 project
idea-plugin.description:
Base 16 Eva for Jetbrains IDE


---------------


Colors by kjakapat (https://github.com/kjakapat). Theme made using base16(https://github.com/chriskempson/base16). Theme generated by Shirom Makkad (https://github.com/ShiromMakkad/base16-jetbrains-ide)
